endpoints.name: Get Current User
endpoints.example:
### Get Current User

```bash
curl -X GET \
  "$BASE_URL/users/me" \
  -H "token-id: $TOKEN_ID" \
  -H "version: $VERSION" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Accept: application/json"
```
endpoints.javascriptExample:
const client = new GHLAPIClient(tokenId);
const result = await client.get current user;
